front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks-- Amendment 15: Multiple I-SID Registration Protocol

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 specifies protocols, procedures, and managed objects to support topology change signaling to alter the binding (held in an l-Component) of Customer addresses to Backbone addresses on a per-l-SID basis. This is accomplished by extending the use of the Multiple Registration Protocol (MRP).
